channel.title: Need to make my server public!
channel.description:
ok soo im gonna tell you what ive tryed
ok first i tryed the port forwarding
and it didnt work out because everytime i pressed new to try and make a thingy it brought me to a page that said done at the bottem so i refreshed and it brought me back to the beginning so i cant do that
and i tryed asking but no one replys plz help

item.title: Need to make my server public!
item.dc:creator: @zezi111 zezi111
item.description:
@zezi111 wrote:

Use hamachi if you can’t portforward and also make sure your firewall is off and you made exception for hamachi.

www.hamachi.cc

Read full topic
item.source: Need to make my server public!
